item.title: Mining Golems!
item.description: You can now come across aggressive golems while mining manually. Read on for the full patch notes...
item.dc:creator: MilkN2Sugars

item.title: Graphics comparison
item.description: I've created some comparisons of the new and old Guilds of Gods map graphics. Check them out here.
item.dc:creator: MilkN2Sugars

item.title: Guilds of Gods player count tracker
item.description: I've just added a player count tracker for Guilds of Gods, which graphs the numbers of players online over time. Hopefully you find it interesting. This is the first proper interactive tool I've added to the site, and I plan on more to come.
item.dc:creator: MilkN2Sugars

item.title: Huge map graphics update!
item.description: The whole Guilds of Gods world has been updated with new graphics. There are now curves!
item.dc:creator: MilkN2Sugars

item.title: Player Owned Market Stalls
item.description: You can now build market stalls to sell items!
item.dc:creator: MilkN2Sugars

item.title: Withdraw X
item.description: You can now use Withdraw X to take a specific amount of an item from your bank! Handy for skills such as smithing where you need to use a certain number of different ores.
item.dc:creator: MilkN2Sugars

item.title: Auto log
item.description: You will now be logged out after 2 minutes if disconnected from the game while in combat.
item.dc:creator: MilkN2Sugars

item.title: Guilds of Gods on Itch.io
item.description: Guilds of Gods is now available on Itch. The game is the same as on the Guilds of Gods website, but adds a handy button in the bottom right to allow you to play in full screen mode. Give it a go here.
item.dc:creator: MilkN2Sugars

item.title: Guild of Gods - where to cut Oak Trees
item.description: I've put together a short guide detailing the best places to cut Oaks. Whether you're looking for trees that are close to a bank, or trees that are close together to cut with a lumber camp, it should have you covered. Take a look here
item.dc:creator: MilkN2Sugars

item.title: Quick tip
item.description: I've just added a quick tip about incinerating noted items which will hopefully save people some time. Take a look here.
item.dc:creator: MilkN2Sugars

item.title: Introducing EzPz GoG!
item.description: I have started work on guides for Guilds of Gods. First up is Woodcutting, check it out here
item.dc:creator: MilkN2Sugars

item.title: Best woodcutting locations and responsive tables
item.description: I've just added a guide with the best place to cut regular trees. Guides for other tree types will be coming soon. I've also made some CSS tweaks to make tables responsive. Some tables in the woodcutting guide were rather large, and causing mobile page to get stretched. They will now scroll instead.
item.dc:creator: MilkN2Sugars

item.title: Massive GoG update!
item.description: A huge new update has just been released, bringing an underground map with caves and dungeons to explore, 60 new items, and the first minigame. Read on for the full patch notes.
item.dc:creator: MilkN2Sugars

item.title: Update 1.6.1 out now
item.description: Update 1.6.1 has been released, bringing some major bug fixes and a couple of content additions. Read the full post here.
item.dc:creator: MilkN2Sugars

item.title: Season One Finale - Sin and Sacrifice is OUT!
item.description: The latest BSG Deadlock DLC is out! Sin and Sacrifice marks the end of season one, and brings a new story campaign, two new ships and voice chatter for Colonial units. Find out more here.
item.dc:creator: MilkN2Sugars

item.title: Veterancy Update out now!
item.description: The free Veterancy Update is out now! This is a major new update bringing a crew veterancy system, which provides ships with bonuses the longer they survive in the campaign. Along with this is a soundtrack selector, ship inspector and more. Read all about it here.
item.dc:creator: MilkN2Sugars

item.title: V0.3.2 out now!
item.description: Stein V0.3.2 is out now! This latest update brings two new dungeons - Bitterburg Ruins and Bitterburg Keep, 70 new items, 10 new quests and more. Read the full update notes here.
item.dc:creator: MilkN2Sugars

item.title: Update 1.6.0 is out now!
item.description: Update 1.6.0 is out now, and it's a big one! Bringing a new planet with a host of new NPCs, quests, items and more. You can read the full update notes here.
item.dc:creator: MilkN2Sugars

item.title: How to catch a Wyrm
item.description: I've noticed quite a few people asking how to catch a Wyrm in Aground, so I've put together a short guide here. Hope it helps!
item.dc:creator: MilkN2Sugars

item.title: V0.3.1 out now!
item.description: Stein V0.3.1 has arrived, bringing a new wave dungeon, crafting items, weapons and more. Read about it here.
item.dc:creator: MilkN2Sugars

item.title: Spacefaring has arrived!
item.description: Update 1.5.5 has been released! You can now take to the skies (and beyond, to space). Get all the details here.
item.dc:creator: MilkN2Sugars

item.title: A couple more Stein quests
item.description: Hi guys, I've added a couple more Stein quest guides to the site: Collect Faligob Slime and Find Foodbox. I've also spent a while figuring out the easiest way to kill Cygluln Hunters. I've got a pretty solid method figured out, so expect a guide tomorrow. Thanks for visiting as always.
item.dc:creator: MilkN2Sugars

item.title: New Stein quest guides
item.description: Even more Stein quests! I've just added the following: Find Hjalmars Pitchfork, More Wine and Talk to Jarmil Soukup.
item.dc:creator: MilkN2Sugars

item.title: 3 new Stein quest guides
item.description: I've just finished adding 3 new Stein quest guides: Kill Wasp Fighter, Find the Teddy and Talk to Hjalmar Karlsen. Hope they help!
item.dc:creator: MilkN2Sugars

item.title: Stein quests!
item.description: I've finished up the quests in Northwind Farm, adding 3 new guides: Hunt Hungry Forest Bears, Hungry Bear Mother and Collect Blueberries. Have a great weekend!
item.dc:creator: MilkN2Sugars

item.title: New Stein quest guides
item.description: I've been having fun in Northwind Farm tonight, bringing you 4 new Stein quest guides: Decimate the Sheep, Slaughter Pigs, Kill Forest Boars and Collect Wool Boxes.
item.dc:creator: MilkN2Sugars

item.title: More Stein!
item.description: Hello everyone! I'm continuing work writing guides for all the Farshore area quests in Stein. I've just added the following: Help Kiana Dejesus, Find Dirk Daristan, Find Viliatus Carlsen and Leaf Beetle Remainings. Happy questing.
item.dc:creator: MilkN2Sugars

item.title: 6 New Stein Quest Guides!
item.description: I hope everyone had a wonderful New Year's Eve, and isn't too hung over! And if you are, well sit back, relax, and play some Stein. I've just added the following quest guides: Collect Filled Box, Motivate Fieldworkers, Kill Mad Boars, Collect Boar Poop, Bring Casamir Poop, and Help Casamir.
item.dc:creator: MilkN2Sugars

item.title: Ask Plamen Lambert quest guide and Happy New Year!
item.description: I've just added a walkthrough for the Ask Plamen Lambert quest. I also hope everyone has a wonderful New Years! 2019 is going to be great.
item.dc:creator: MilkN2Sugars

item.title: Quests, quests, quests!
item.description: I've added guides for the following quests: Report Alan Daristan, Find Luludja Luscombe, Collect Tasty Grapes, Tell Casamir Luscombe, Inspect Mutated Plants, Harvest Mutated Vines. Enjoy.
item.dc:creator: MilkN2Sugars

item.title: 3 More Quests!
item.description: I'm back with a few more quests: Talk to Alan Daristan, Find Aska Daristan and Help Aska Daristan. Hope you find them useful.
item.dc:creator: MilkN2Sugars

item.title: 3 New Stein Quest Guides
item.description: I hope everyone is having a good weekend! I've just added 3 new Stein quest guides: Kill Brown Bears, Collect Bear Bones and Kill Beowulf the Old. Hope they help.
item.dc:creator: MilkN2Sugars

item.title: Stein Quest Guide
item.description: You guessed it, another Stein quest guide. This time for Talk to Rory Pulu. Enjoy.
item.dc:creator: MilkN2Sugars

item.title: 2 More Stein Quests
item.description: Well it's that weird time between Christmas and New Year. Some people are working. Some people are getting drunk at 10 am. But I don't think many people care much about anything. Myself, I've just added 2 new Stein quest guides to the site: Kill Furious Boars and Collect Cave Bug Wings. Enjoy.
item.dc:creator: MilkN2Sugars

item.title: Happy Boxing Day and More Stein Quests
item.description: I hope everyone had a wonderful Chirstmas, and is now enjoying boxing day. I've just updated the site with three more Stein quest guides: Find Rory Pulu, Where is Quintin Conner and Kill Little Cave Bugs.
item.dc:creator: MilkN2Sugars

item.title: New Quest Guide
item.description: I've just added a walkthrough for the Collect Wasp Stings quest. Hope it helps!
item.dc:creator: MilkN2Sugars

item.title: Merry Christmas!
item.description: I hope everyone has a wonderful Christmas.
item.dc:creator: MilkN2Sugars

item.title: Stein Quest Guides
item.description: I've just added guides for the Destroy Spider Cocoons and Collect Harvest quests. Hope they help!
item.dc:creator: MilkN2Sugars

item.title: Internal Links
item.description: I've added internal links to all existing guides to make navigating around easier. For example, if a quest is listed as a prerequisite, you can now click it to find out more information. I've also tweaked some URLs to make things more consistent. For example, game hubs can be reached at both /game and game/index. Links around the site now use the former, simpler syntax.
item.dc:creator: MilkN2Sugars

item.title: About and Contact Pages
item.description: I have (finally!) got around to setting up the About and Contact pages. Say hi!
item.dc:creator: MilkN2Sugars

item.title: Anabasis now has difficulty levels
item.description: You can now choose between, easy, normal and hard difficulty in the Operation Anabasis game mode. This update also brings a number of smaller fixes. Get all the details here.
item.dc:creator: MilkN2Sugars

item.title: Comments and Favicons
item.description: I've finished adding comments and favicons. Click read more for the details.
item.dc:creator: MilkN2Sugars

item.title: All Games Button Fixed
item.description: Little bit embarrassing, but turns out the "All Games" button on the homepage wasn't linking anywhere, whoops. All fixed now.
item.dc:creator: MilkN2Sugars

item.title: More Stein Quest Guides!
item.description: I'm continuing on my quest for, er, quests. The following new walkthroughs have been added: Talk to Catherine, Gather Aseona Berries, Bring Roseen Greenhill Berries, Talk to Gilbert Greenhill, Bring Roseen a Big Fish and Find Aad Zweerink. Hope you find them useful!
item.dc:creator: MilkN2Sugars

item.title: 2 More Stein Quest Guides!
item.description: I've added walkthroughs for the Bring Potatoes and Read the Bulletin Board quests.
item.dc:creator: MilkN2Sugars

item.title: More Stein Quest Guides
item.description: I've added the remainder of the Stein quest guides I've written, you can take a look here. I'll be working on getting more added in the coming days.
item.dc:creator: MilkN2Sugars

item.title: Stein Quest Guides
item.description: I've started the process of adding the Stein quest guides I've written to the site. Many Stein quests are rather simple, but in others it's not always clear where to go or what to do, so hopefully some people find them useful. I need to do the quests anyway, so why not document it, right? :) You can view them here In other news, the news(!) links in the game headers and indexes now work correctly.
item.dc:creator: MilkN2Sugars

item.title: Update 1.5.1 is out!
item.description: Update 1.5.1 is is out! This latest release features new quests and areas for the magic path, including launching into space! I'll be working on getting guides written for this new content as soon as possible.
item.dc:creator: MilkN2Sugars

item.title: Battlestar Galactica Deadlock Ship Guides
item.description: I've added guides for 6 of the Battlestar Galactica Deadlock ship classes. Each features an overview of the class include stats, turret placement, munitions and more, before taking a look at how it can be used most effectively in engagements. You can take a look here. I'm working on finishing the remainder of the Colonial classes, then moving on to Cylon ships as soon as I can.
item.dc:creator: MilkN2Sugars

item.title: Battlestar Galactica Deadlock Anabasis is out now!
item.description: Battlestar Galactica Deadlock Anabasis has been released! Described as the mist significant expansion so far, the update includes a new game mode, 11 new maps, 12 new resource missions and 4 new munition types! Find out more on the Steam page here.
item.dc:creator: MilkN2Sugars

item.title: Aground Quest Guides!
item.description: I've added around 30 quest guides for Aground. The guides cover most of the Magic and Science paths, including prerequisites, starting location, rewards, and a simple step by step walkthrough for what you need to do. Check them out here!
item.dc:creator: MilkN2Sugars
